method.name: FindChannelOfObject
method.description: (Inherited from Base) Finds an animation channel acting on this object. If this function is called on a type that cannot be animated (such as Director), it returns null. ; You can limit the search to a particular director by using the syntax "directorName$channelName" for the channelName argument. Nested directors may be specified like this: "directorName1$directorName2$channelName".
method.code_insight_hint: Function FindChannelOfObject(channelName As String) As Channel

method.name: FindKeyframeOfObject
method.description: (Inherited from Base) Finds a keyframe acting on the object. If this function is called on a type that cannot be animated (such as Director), it returns null. ; You can limit the search to a particular director by using the syntax "directorName$keyframeName" for the keyframeName argument. Nested directors may be specified like this: "directorName1$directorName2$keyframeName".
method.code_insight_hint: Function FindKeyframeOfObject(keyframeName As String) As Keyframe

method.code_insight_hint: Sub Erase(index As Integer)

method.code_insight_hint: Sub Insert(index As Integer, element As Type)

method.name: Pop
method.description: removes the last element
method.code_insight_hint: Sub Pop()

method.code_insight_hint: Sub Push(element As Type)

method.name: Sort
method.description: Sorts the array. comparisonFunction must be the name of a user-defined comparison function that takes two arguments of type Type and returns an integer. The return value must be -1 if the the first arguement is smaller than the second, 1 if the first argument is greater than the second, and 0 if the arguments are equal. object is the this pointer passed to the comparison function. It may be null if the camparison function does not access any member variables. The comparison function must be defined in the same script as the Type (if it is a structure) or in the script where Sort is called.
method.code_insight_hint: Function Sort(object As Base, comparisonFunction As String) As Boolean

scope.name: ClipChannel
scope.description: A ClipChannel object. The ClipChannel member of the Base type provides access to the clip channel. Use System.GetClipChannel(number as Integer), whereas number >= 0, to get a ClipChannel instance. See also examples section ClipChannel.

property.name: AutoRun
property.description: Get/Set the autorun mode. If true then the clip start playing automatically upon load.

property.name: ClipChannelID
property.description: Get the clip channel number.

property.name: CurrentFrame
property.description: Get the current frame.

property.name: CurrentFramePending
property.description: Get the current frame of the pending clip.

property.name: Duration
property.description: Get the number of frames of the current clip.

property.name: DurationPending
property.description: Get the number of frames of the pending clip.

property.name: FrameIn
property.description: Get/Set the In frame.

property.name: FrameInActive
property.description: Get/Set the In frame on the active clip player.

property.name: FrameInPending
property.description: Get/Set the In frame on the pending clip player.

property.name: FrameOut
property.description: Get/Set the Out frame.

property.name: FrameOutActive
property.description: Get/Set the Out frame on the active clip player.

property.name: FrameOutPending
property.description: Get/Set the Out frame on the pending clip player.

property.name: LoopMode
property.description: Get/Set the loop mode. If true (=default), then the clip will be looped.

property.name: LoopModeActive
property.description: Get/Set the loop mode on the active clip player. If true (=default), then the clip will be looped.

property.name: LoopModePending
property.description: Get/Set the loop mode on the pending clip player. If true (=default), then the clip will be looped.

property.name: ModeOnLoadError
property.description: Determines the mode upon an error situation when loading a clip. none|pause|stop|flush

property.name: ModeOnLoadError_FLUSH
property.description: Constant for mode on load error flush.

property.name: ModeOnLoadError_NONE
property.description: Constant for mode on load error none.

property.name: ModeOnLoadError_PAUSE
property.description: Constant for mode on load error pause.

property.name: ModeOnLoadError_STOP
property.description: Constant for mode on load error stop.

property.name: PendingClipSupported
property.description: Determines if support for loading pending clips is available.

property.name: PlayBackSpeed
property.description: Get/Set the playback speed.

property.name: PlayBackSpeedActive
property.description: Get/Set the playback speed on the active clip player.

property.name: PlayBackSpeedPending
property.description: Get/Set the playback speed on the pending clip palyer.

property.name: PlayMode
property.description: Get the current mode of the clip channel.

property.name: PlayMode_ERROR
property.description: Constant for current mode ERROR.

property.name: PlayMode_NONE
property.description: Constant for current mode NONE.

property.name: PlayMode_PLAY
property.description: Constant for current mode PLAYING.

property.name: PlayMode_PLAY_PENDING
property.description: Constant for current mode PLAYING_PENDING.

property.name: PlayMode_SCRUB
property.description: Constant for current mode SCRUBBING.

property.name: PlayMode_SCRUB_EOF
property.description: Constant for current mode SCRUBBING_EOF.

property.name: PlayMode_STOP
property.description: Constant for current mode STOP.

property.name: PlayModePending
property.description: Get the current mode of the pending clip player.

property.name: RepeatMode
property.description: Get/Set the repeat mode for playback and pause. none|field|frame.

property.name: RepeatMode_FIELD
property.description: Constant for repeat mode field.

property.name: RepeatMode_FRAME
property.description: Constant for repeat mode frame.

property.name: RepeatMode_NONE
property.description: Constant for repeat mode none.

property.name: RepeatModeActive
property.description: Get/Set the repeat mode for playback and pause on the active clip player. none|field|frame.

property.name: RepeatModePending
property.description: Get/Set the repeat mode for playback and pause on the pending clip player. none|field|frame.

property.name: ReverseFields
property.description: If true swap fields when playing interlaced material backwards.

property.name: ReverseFieldsActive
property.description: If true swap fields when playing interlaced material backwards on the active clip player.

property.name: ReverseFieldsPending
property.description: If true swap fields when playing interlaced material backwards on the pending clip player.

property.description: (Inherited from Base) Gets system wide data.

property.description: If true then upscale the luma value in the separate key file.

property.description: If true then upscale the luma value in the separate key file on the active clip player.

property.name: UpscaleLumaPending
property.description: If true then upscale the luma value in the separate key file on the pending clip player.

method.name: FindChannelOfObject
method.description: (Inherited from Base) Finds an animation channel acting on this object. If this function is called on a type that cannot be animated (such as Director), it returns null. ; You can limit the search to a particular director by using the syntax "directorName$channelName" for the channelName argument. Nested directors may be specified like this: "directorName1$directorName2$channelName".
method.code_insight_hint: Function FindChannelOfObject(channelName As String) As Channel

method.name: FindKeyframeOfObject
method.description: (Inherited from Base) Finds a keyframe acting on the object. If this function is called on a type that cannot be animated (such as Director), it returns null. ; You can limit the search to a particular director by using the syntax "directorName$keyframeName" for the keyframeName argument. Nested directors may be specified like this: "directorName1$directorName2$keyframeName".
method.code_insight_hint: Function FindKeyframeOfObject(keyframeName As String) As Keyframe

method.name: FindOrCreateChannelOfObject
method.description: (Inherited from Base) This function works like FindChannelOfObject except that if no animation channel with the specifed name exists, a new one is created.
method.code_insight_hint: Function FindOrCreateChannelOfObject(channelName As String) As Channel

method.name: FindSiblingSubContainer
method.description: Searches among the container's siblings (as well as the container itself) and their sub-containers for a container with the specified name. Otherwise identical to FindSubContainer.
method.code_insight_hint: Function FindSiblingSubContainer(name As String) As Container

method.name: FindSubContainer
method.description: Searches for a sub-container with the specified name. The search mode is breadth-first. It's possible to combine multiple calls to this function into one call by concatenating the individual container names using $ as a separator. For example, FindSubContainer("name1$name2") has the same effect as FindSubContainer("name1").FindSubContainer("name2").
method.code_insight_hint: Function FindSubContainer(name As String) As Container

method.name: FindSuperContainer
method.description: Searches for a super-container with the specified name.
method.code_insight_hint: Function FindSuperContainer(name As String) As Container

method.name: GetBoundingBox
method.description: Returns in v1_out and v2_out the left-bottom-back and right-top-front vertices of the container's bounding box.
method.code_insight_hint: Sub GetBoundingBox(v1_out As Vertex, v2_out As Vertex)

method.name: GetBoundingBoxDimensions
method.description: Returns the dimensions (width, height, depth) of the container's bounding box. (The used bounding box was calculated in the last frame.)
method.code_insight_hint: Function GetBoundingBoxDimensions() As Vertex

method.name: GetChannelsOfObject
method.description: (Inherited from Base) Fills the array v with the animation channels acting on this object, returning the number of channels. If this function is called on a type that cannot be animated (such as Director), v will be empty.
method.code_insight_hint: Function GetChannelsOfObject([out] v As Array[Channel]) As Integer

method.name: GetChildContainerByIndex
method.description: Returns the child container specified by index.

method.description: Returns the first child container containing the mouse cursor.
method.code_insight_hint: Function GetChildContainerContainingMouseCursor() As Container

method.name: GetContainerAndSubContainers
method.code_insight_hint: Sub GetContainerAndSubContainers([out] v As Array[Container], traverseMergedGeometries As Boolean)

method.name: GetDirector
method.description: Finds the first director containing an animation of this container.
method.code_insight_hint: Function GetDirector() As Director

method.name: GetDirectorOfMergedGeometry
method.description: If this container holds a merged geometry with an embedded animation, this function returns the corresponding director.
method.code_insight_hint: Function GetDirectorOfMergedGeometry() As Director

method.name: GetFirstActiveChildContainer
method.description: Returns the first (=topmost) active child container.
method.code_insight_hint: Function GetFirstActiveChildContainer() As Container

method.name: GetFunctionPluginInstance
method.description: Provides access to the parameters of a function plugin residing on the container.
method.code_insight_hint: Function GetFunctionPluginInstance(pluginName As String) As PluginInstance

method.name: GetGeometryPluginInstance
method.description: Provides access to the parameters of a geometry plugin residing on the container.
method.code_insight_hint: Function GetGeometryPluginInstance() As PluginInstance

method.name: GetIndexOfFirstActiveChildContainer
method.description: Returns the 0-based index of the first active child container within the container (or -1 if there is no active child).
method.code_insight_hint: Function GetIndexOfFirstActiveChildContainer() As Integer

method.name: GetLocalIndex
method.description: Returns the 0-based index of the container within its parent.
method.code_insight_hint: Function GetLocalIndex() As Integer

method.name: GetScreenBounds
method.description: Returns in v1_out and v2_out the left-bottom and right-top screen coordinates defining the rectangle occupied by the container. (The used bounding box was calculated in the last frame.)
method.code_insight_hint: Sub GetScreenBounds(v1_out As Vertex, v2_out As Vertex)

method.name: GetScreenPointToGeomSurface
method.description: This procedure calculates the geometry intersection with the projected ray from the specified screen position and returns true on success. The intersection point is returned in world coordinates.
method.code_insight_hint: Function GetScreenPointToGeomSurface(x As Integer, y As Integer, pos As Vertex) As Boolean

method.name: GetScreenPositionOrtho
method.description: This procedure gets the container's screen position in the same way as you can do it via GUI in the Transformation Editor. There can't be any rotation on the object.
method.code_insight_hint: Function GetScreenPositionOrtho(x As Integer, y As Integer) As Boolean

method.name: GetTransformedBoundingBox
method.description: Returns in v1_out and v2_out the left-bottom-back and right-top-front vertices of the container's bounding box with applied transformation matrix.
method.code_insight_hint: Sub GetTransformedBoundingBox(v1_out As Vertex, v2_out As Vertex)

method.name: GetTransformedBoundingBoxDimensions
method.description: Returns the dimensions (width, height, depth) of the container's bounding box with applied transformation matrix. (The used bounding box was calculated in the last frame.)
method.code_insight_hint: Function GetTransformedBoundingBoxDimensions() As Vertex

method.name: GetUVCoordinatesOfScreenPoint
method.description: Transforms (x, y) into (u, v) coordinates that are relative to the x/y cross section of the container's bounding box. The (u, v) coordinates are returned in the x and y components of the returned vertex (the z coordinate is always 0.0). If (x, y) are within the bounding-box area, u and v will be within the range [0.0, 1.0].
method.code_insight_hint: Function GetUVCoordinatesOfScreenPoint(x As Integer, y As Integer) As Vertex

method.name: HideAllChildContainers
method.description: Makes all child containers invisible.
method.code_insight_hint: Sub HideAllChildContainers()

method.name: IsAnimated
method.description: (Inherited from Base) Returns true if there are animation channels for this object. If this function is called on a type that cannot be animated (such as Director), it always returns false.
method.code_insight_hint: Function IsAnimated() As Boolean

method.name: IsOnTop
method.description: Returns true if and only if the container is on top at the mouse cursor position. For this procedure to work correctly, it is required that at least one enter or leave callback be defined on the container or on a super-container.
method.code_insight_hint: Function IsOnTop() As Boolean

method.name: IsScreenPointInBoundingBox
method.description: Returns true if the screen point (x, y) is inside the area covered by the container's bounding box. (The used bounding box was calculated in the last frame.)
method.code_insight_hint: Function IsScreenPointInBoundingBox(x As Integer, y As Integer) As Boolean

method.name: IsVertexInBoundingBox
method.description: Returns true if v (which must be specified in world coordinates) is inside the container's bounding box. (The used bounding box was calculated in the last frame.)
method.code_insight_hint: Function IsVertexInBoundingBox(v As Vertex) As Boolean

method.name: LocalPosToScreenPos
method.description: Converts local position to the position on the screen.
method.code_insight_hint: Sub LocalPosToScreenPos(pos As Vertex, [out] dX As Double, [out] dY As Double)

method.name: LocalPosToWorldPos
method.description: Converts the local position to a world coordinate space position.
method.code_insight_hint: Function LocalPosToWorldPos(pos As Vertex) As Vertex

method.name: MoveAllChannelsToDirector
method.description: Moves the animation channels to the specified director.
method.code_insight_hint: Sub MoveAllChannelsToDirector(director As Director)

method.name: MoveTo
method.description: Moves the container; where =; TL_NEXT; TL_PREVIOUS; TL_DOWN.
method.code_insight_hint: Function MoveTo(destination As Container, where As Integer) As Container

method.name: MoveToKeepTransformation
method.description: Moves the container preserving the containers transformation; where =; TL_NEXT; TL_PREVIOUS; TL_DOWN.
method.code_insight_hint: Function MoveToKeepTransformation(destination As Container, where As Integer) As Container

method.name: RecomputeMatrix
method.description: Recalculate transformation matrix of the container. This function is useful if you can't wait one field for the updated matrix. Use it carefully and only where it is really needed (current transformation matrix, transformed bounding box, screen-position or screen-size)
method.code_insight_hint: Sub RecomputeMatrix()

method.name: ScreenOffsetToContainerOffset
method.description: Transforms a pixel offset into the corresponding offset in local container coordinates. In other words, the vector returned by this procedure is the vector you need to add to the container's local position (i.e. Position.Xyz) in order to make the container move (dx, dy) pixels on the screen.
method.code_insight_hint: Function ScreenOffsetToContainerOffset(dx As Integer, dy As Integer) As Vertex

method.name: ScreenPosToLocalGrid
method.description: Converts the screen position to current grid intersection point. The returned coordinates are in local container coordinate space.
method.code_insight_hint: Function ScreenPosToLocalGrid(dX As Double, dY As Double) As Vertex

method.name: ScreenPosToLocalPos
method.description: Converts the screen position to the local container position. This would mean that if you assign the returned vertex to the local container's position then it moves exactly to the passed screen position (orthogonal to camera).
method.code_insight_hint: Function ScreenPosToLocalPos(dX As Double, dY As Double) As Vertex

method.name: SetCenterPositionLocked
method.description: This procedure sets the container's center point without affecting its position.
method.code_insight_hint: Sub SetCenterPositionLocked(center As Vertex)

method.name: SetCenterScreenGridPositionLocked
method.description: This procedure sets the container's center point to the passed screen position, using the current grid, without affecting the container position.
method.code_insight_hint: Sub SetCenterScreenGridPositionLocked(dX As Double, dY As Double)

method.name: SetCenterScreenPositionLocked
method.description: This procedure sets the container's center point to the passed screen position without affecting the container position.
method.code_insight_hint: Sub SetCenterScreenPositionLocked(dX As Double, dY As Double)

method.name: SetChanged
method.description: (Inherited from Base) Mark this object as changed.
method.code_insight_hint: Sub SetChanged()

method.name: SetScreenPositionOrtho
method.description: This procedure sets the container's screen position in the same way as you can do it via GUI in the Transformation Editor. There can't be any rotation on the object.
method.code_insight_hint: Function SetScreenPositionOrtho(x As Integer, y As Integer) As Boolean

method.name: ShowAllChildContainers
method.description: Makes all child containers visible.
method.code_insight_hint: Sub ShowAllChildContainers()

method.name: ShowOneChildContainer
method.description: Makes the child container specified by index visible and all other child containers invisible.

method.name: FindContainer
method.description: Searches the scene tree for a container named name. The search mode is breadth-first. It's possible to combine a call to this function and multiple calls to Container.FindSubContainer into a single call by concatenating the individual container names using $ as a separator. For example, scene.FindContainer("name1$name2") has the same effect as scene.FindContainer("name1").FindSubContainer("name2").

scope.description: A script's local settings.

property.name: CallButtonDownForTopObjectsOnly
property.description: If set to true, the OnXButtonDown procedures are called only if the container contains the mouse cursor and is on top at the mouse cursor position. Default = true.

property.name: CallEnterLeaveForTopObjectsOnly
property.description: If set to true, OnEnter/OnLeave/OnEnterSubContainer/OnLeaveSubContainer is called only if the container is on top at the mouse cursor position. Default = true.

property.name: CallMouseMoveForTopObjectsOnly
property.description: If set to true, OnMouseMove is called only if the container contains the mouse cursor and is on top at the mouse cursor position. Default = false.

property.name: CallEnterLeaveForBackgroundObjects
property.description: Deprecated. Use CallEnterLeaveForTopObjectsOnly instead.

property.name: CallMouseMoveForBackgroundObjects
property.description: Deprecated. Use CallMouseMoveForTopObjectsOnly instead.

scope.name: SharedMemory
scope.description:
A storage object that holds a map of Variant objects indexed by a string. It can be used for system-wide or scene-wide data sharing. To access an individual value, use the index operator. Example:
' Script 1: dim a = 123 ' define an integer variable System.Map["my_global_variable"] = a ' ' Script 2: dim a = (Integer)System.Map["my_global_variable"]

method.name: SendRemoteCommand
method.description: Sends a command string to a viz engine running on another PC.; If timeoutInMs > 0, the procedure waits at most timeoutInMs milliseconds for an answer, and susequently returns that answer.; If timeoutInMs = 0, the procedure returns immediatly, ignoring any answer.
method.code_insight_hint: Function SendRemoteCommand(hostname As String, port As Integer, commandString As String, timeoutInMs As Integer) As String

method.description: (Inherited from Base) Mark this object as changed.
method.code_insight_hint: Sub SetChanged()

method.description: Launches an application. If activate is false, the application window is minimized.

method.name: StopSound
method.description: Stops sound playback. See PlaySound.
method.code_insight_hint: Sub StopSound()

method.name: TcpSend
method.description: Sends a command string via TCP/IP to a remote socket. Unlike SendRemoteCommand, this procedure sends the command string as is, that is without a viz command identifier attached.; The timeoutInMs has the same meaning as for SendRemoteCommand.
method.code_insight_hint: Function TcpSend(hostname As String, port As Integer, commandString As String, timeoutInMs As Integer) As String

method.name: TcpSendAsync
method.description: Sends a command string via TCP/IP to a remote socket. Unlike TcpSend, this procedure works asynchron and the return result is stored in a shared memory map, at your defined sharedMemoryKey.; The defined sharedMemoryKey or its RegisterChangedCallback will be searched in the maps in the following order: Scene.Map, System.Map and VizCommunication.Map; If timeoutInMs is set to 0 then TcpSendAsync will wait until a answer is received or as long as no error occurs (e.g. host doesn't exist).
method.code_insight_hint: Sub TcpSendAsync(sharedMemoryKey As String, hostname As String, port As Integer, commandString As String, timeoutInMs As Integer)

method.name: TcpSendAsyncStatus
method.description: Same as TcpSendAsync but with additional status Shared Memory Key which informs you about the transmission process. The following Messages (Strings) will be returned in sharedMemoryKeyStatus: ; SENDING; RECEIVED; ERROR; TIMEOUT; The timeoutInMs has the same meaning as for TcpSendAsync.
method.code_insight_hint: Sub TcpSendAsyncStatus(sharedMemoryKey As String, hostname As String, port As Integer, commandString As String, timeoutInMs As Integer, sharedMemoryKeyStatus As String)
